task.title: Install on iOS
task.shortdesc: Download and install the app from Apple Play Store.

prereq.p: An iPhone or iPad running iOS 14.0 or later with internet access.

step.cmd: Open the App Store on your device.
Tap the Search tab and enter "".
Select the app from the search results.
Tap Get and confirm with your Apple ID or Face/Touch ID.

result.p: The app is now installed and ready to use.
